title: #066 - Success Mindset w/ NYT Best-Selling Illustrator Holly Hatam
itunes:title: #066 - Success Mindset w/ NYT Best-Selling Illustrator Holly Hatam
description: Today, we welcome Holly Hatam, New-York Times Best-Selling Illustrator, Greeting Card Designer, Picture Book Maker, Author, and Designer. Holly discusses her dedicated path from going from graphic design to her core-love of illustration. Hear how Holly has maintained her belief in herself while overcoming stumbling blocks and transitioning into having her life changed by getting her current agent and becoming a successful children’s book author. Gain insight from how Holly navigates her family life as a mother and a wife while staying inspired as an authentic creative.
